claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mary Marvel is a fictional character originally published by Fawcett Comics and now owned by DC Comics .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Created by Otto Binder and Marc Swayze , she first appeared in Captain Marvel Adventures # 18  (  cover-dated Dec. 1942  )  .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The character is a member of the Marvel/Shazam Family of heroes associated with the superhero Shazam/Captain Marvel .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She is the alter ego of teenager Mary Batson  (  adopted name Mary Bromfield  )  , twin sister of Captain Marvel 's alter-ego , Billy Batson .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Like her brother , Mary has been granted the power of the wizard Shazam , and has but to speak the wizard 's name to be transformed into the superpowered Mary Marvel .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mary Marvel was one of the first female spin-offs of a major male superhero , and predates the introduction of Superman 's female cousin Supergirl  (  also created by Otto Binder  )  by more than a decade .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Following DC 's licensing of the Marvel Family characters in 1972 , Mary Marvel began appearing in DC Comics , co-starring in DC series such as Shazam !

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Two limited series from 2007-2009 , Countdown and Final Crisis , feature an evil version of Mary Marvel having acquired powers from first Shazam Family archenemy Black Adam and further from Apokoliptian supervillain god Desaad .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In current continuity following DC 's 2011 New 52 reboot , Mary Bromfield appears as one of Billy Batson 's foster siblings , and can share Billy 's power at his whim to become an adult superhero similar to the traditional Mary Marvel  (  the `` Marvel '' monikers having been retired with the reboot  )  .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Created in 1942 by writers Otto Binder and Ed Herron , and Fawcett artists C. C. Beck , Mac Raboy , and Marc Swayze , the team is an extension of Fawcett 's Captain Marvel franchise , and includes Marvel 's sister Mary Marvel , their friend Captain Marvel Jr. , and , at various times , a number of other characters as well .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mary Marvel was one of the first female spin-offs of a major male superhero , and predates the introduction of Superman 's female cousin Supergirl  (  also created by Otto Binder  )  by more than a decade .

claim: Mary Marvel was created by an author of history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The first Mary Marvel character sketches came from Swayze 's drawing table , and he illustrated her earliest adventures , including the classic origin story , `` Captain Marvel Introduces Mary Marvel ''  (  Captain Marvel Adventures # 18 , Dec. 1942  )  .
